a.n: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! I (2)

p.k:
Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet.
While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village (2020).
